about_the_game:
Simple gameplay, where you use the keyboard to move and the mouse to perform actions and attack.
Your objective is to go through all the waves without being defeated and without letting Sakura fall, kill as many monsters within the wave time to be able to level up and earn rewards, as well as finishing a wave will give you a chance to improve yours Sakura.
Unlock various achievements and advance further and further with your learning from other play.

Do your best to protect Sakura as she grows stronger!

  • Waves Gameplay
  • Frenetic Song
  • Satisfactory Gameplay
  • Funny and Rewarding

name: Sakura Blossom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
